backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a header logo update and related files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide outlining prerequisites and steps for deploying the site to IC mainnet, including required assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive OKLCH CSS variables and dark mode definitions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with SEO metadata, favicon links, fonts, and script mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app assembling header and all page sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Empty file placeholder for a site footer component.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Fixed responsive header with logo, smooth-scroll navigation, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutCa: Section presenting four manufacturing capabilities with icons and brief descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Section highlighting four carpet benefits using icon cards in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/sections/Collect: Collections grid showing four carpet categories with randomized thumbnails and features.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders a contact section with cards for phone, email, and location plus buttons linking to sample requests and calls using CONTACT config.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Displays a filterable image gallery with modal preview, error handling, and asset URL encoding via getPublicAssetUrl.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background image and buttons that smooth-scroll to gallery and contact sections.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Exports constant contact details including phone, email, and location with map URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity with login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining color variables, typography, and global styles for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint setting up React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Builds encoded URLs for static assets, respecting base paths and handling special characters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, defining content paths, extending theme with custom colors, fonts, animations, and including typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata storing current state, features, and a pending request related to resizing and centering a header logo image.
